pageContext.claim: “And he loves Comey. You look at the relationship with those two. So whether it's love or deep like, but he was conflicted.”
pageContext.analysis: Former FBI director James Comey and Robert Mueller are professional colleagues, not friends. “We're not friends in any social sense," Comey told Congress. “I don't know his phone number, I've never been to his house, I don't know his children’s names.”
